bwwExcerpt: "'9 to 5' is a Big Mac musical, a surprise-free entertainment machine based on a hit movie. Buy a ticket and you don't have to guess what you'll be getting: You already know, right down to the number of pickles on the sesame-seed bun that is Joe Mantello's ultraefficient staging. From start to finish, it does what it's supposed to do -- and no more."
